They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Fintech &ndash; OPay

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented Accountant to oversee financial reporting, record-keeping, and compliance within the organization.
	The ideal candidate must possess strong analytical abilities, excellent knowledge of accounting principles, and hands-on experience with financial systems.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and maintain accurate financial records, statements, and reports.
	Reconcile accounts, ledgers, and financial transactions to ensure accuracy.
	Manage accounts payable and receivable processes.
	Conduct monthly, quarterly, and annual financial closing activities.
	Ensure compliance with accounting standards, internal controls, and regulatory requirements.
	Assist with budget preparation, forecasting, and financial performance analysis.
	Support external audit activities and provide required documentation.
	Monitor cash flow, expense tracking, and financial risk indicators.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	3&ndash;5 years of professional accounting experience, preferably in fintech, banking, or corporate finance.
	ICAN certification is mandatory.
	Advanced Microsoft Excel skills are required (PivotTables, VLOOKUP, formulas, data analysis).
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, SAP, or similar) is an advantage.
	Strong analytical and reporting skills.
	Excellent knowledge of financial regulations and accounting standards.
	High level of accuracy, confidentiality, and attention to detail.


Benefits


	Competitive salary
	Performance incentives
	HMO
	Pension
	Professional development and career growth opportunities


Method of Application&nbsp;
